info.title: CLOB API
info.description: Specification for the central limit order book service. Import this file into Paw (RapidAPI Client) to explore and test the available endpoints.

409.description: Condition or system is paused and cannot accept new orders.

delete.summary: Cancel open orders for a market or asset

409.description: One or more conditions or the system is paused.

get.summary: List live orders for the authenticated account

parameters.name: next_cursor
parameters.description: Base64-encoded offset for pagination. Use `MA==` to start; `LTE=` means no more pages.

200.description: Open orders owned by the authenticated account.

limit.description: Page size used for the query.

count.description: Number of items returned in this page.

get.summary: Get a token order book snapshot
Get the best price for a side

parameters.name: side
parameters.description: Market side to quote (BUY fetches the best ask, SELL fetches the best bid).

200.description: Best price for the requested side

post.summary: Get best prices for many tokens

200.description: Best bid/ask for each requested token
Most recent trade side/price for each token that has traded.

parameters.name: startTs
parameters.description: Start of the time range (unix timestamp in seconds). Required when interval is absent.

parameters.name: endTs
parameters.description: End of the time range (unix timestamp in seconds). Defaults to now when omitted.

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: Preset time window to query. Cannot be used with startTs/endTs.

parameters.name: fidelity
parameters.description: Bucket size in minutes when using explicit timestamps. Auto-calculated when omitted.

post.summary: Cancel outstanding orders for a paused condition

409.description: Condition must be paused before it can be cleared.

get.summary: List users with wallet and API key metadata

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Filter to the user owning the supplied API key UUID.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Zero-based page index. Each page returns up to 1,000 users.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of users per page (1-1000, defaults to 1000).

200.description: Matching users and their API keys.

parameters.name: cascade
parameters.description: Also ban users referred by this user

post.summary: Ban a user and revoke their API keys
Derive or create an API key (L1)

404.description: API key not found for the provided address/nonce

get.summary: List active API keys for the wallet (L2)

200.description: Active API keys for the authenticated address and chain

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Wallet address associated with the readonly key.

parameters.name: signature_type
parameters.description: Signature type used for conditional asset approvals.

parameters.name: signature_type
parameters.description: Signature type used for conditional asset approvals.

parameters.name: next_cursor
parameters.description: Base64 offset cursor (use `MA==` for the first page).

parameters.name: next_cursor
parameters.description: Base64 offset cursor (use `MA==` for the first page).

parameters.name: next_cursor
parameters.description: Base64 offset cursor (use `MA==` for the first page).

parameters.name: next_cursor
parameters.description: Base64 offset cursor (use `MA==` for the first page).

get.summary: List trades for the authenticated account

parameters.name: taker
parameters.description: Return trades where the taker address matches this value.

parameters.name: maker
parameters.description: Return trades where the counterparty maker address matches this value.

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Unix timestamp; include trades strictly before this instant.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Unix timestamp; include trades strictly after this instant.

parameters.name: next_cursor
parameters.description: Base64-encoded offset for pagination. Use `MA==` to start; `LTE=` means no more pages.

limit.description: Page size used for the query.

count.description: Number of items returned in this page.

parameters.name: signature_type
parameters.description: Signature type used by the caller.

parameters.name: maker_address
parameters.description: Return trades matching this maker address.

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Unix timestamp; include trades strictly before this instant.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Unix timestamp; include trades strictly after this instant.

parameters.name: next_cursor
parameters.description: Base64-encoded offset for pagination. Use `MA==` to start; `LTE=` means no more pages.

get.summary: Get best RFQ quote for a request

200.description: Most recent trade price for the token.
Spread between best ask and best bid.

get.summary: Check if an order is scoring (L2)

KuestAddress.name: KUEST_ADDRESS
KuestAddress.description: Checksummed wallet address performing the request.

KuestSignatureL1.name: KUEST_SIGNATURE
KuestSignatureL1.description: EIP-712 signature for the L1 challenge payload.

KuestSignatureL2.name: KUEST_SIGNATURE
KuestSignatureL2.description: Hex-encoded HMAC-SHA256 signature built from the L2 signing string.

KuestTimestamp.name: KUEST_TIMESTAMP
KuestTimestamp.description: Millisecond epoch timestamp (string) used for freshness checks.

KuestNonce.name: KUEST_NONCE
KuestNonce.description: Unsigned 256-bit nonce value represented as a decimal string.

XChainId.name: X-Chain-Id
XChainId.description: EVM chain ID used for the signature domain.

KuestApiKey.name: KUEST_API_KEY
KuestApiKey.description: API key obtained from the L1 derivation endpoint.

KuestPassphrase.name: KUEST_PASSPHRASE
KuestPassphrase.description: 64 character hexadecimal passphrase associated with the API key.

KuestReferral.name: KUEST_REFERRAL
KuestReferral.description: Optional wallet address (0x…) to credit as the referrer.

apiKey.description: Deterministic UUID v4 identifier for the API key.

secret.description: Base64 encoded secret used for HMAC L2 signatures.

passphrase.description: 64-character hexadecimal passphrase paired with the API key.

revoked.description: Whether the key is now marked as revoked (always true).

closedOnly.description: Whether the account is restricted to closed-only mode.

deleted.description: Whether the readonly key was revoked.

valid.description: Whether the readonly key is valid for the address.

allowances.description: Allowance or approval per exchange address (base units or 1/0).

minimum_tick_size.description: Minimum allowable tick size for the market.

neg_risk.description: Whether the market is marked as negative risk.

base_fee.description: Base fee rate in basis points.

heartbeat_id.description: Heartbeat identifier to continue an existing session.

assetIn.description: Asset received (token ID or "0" for USDC).

assetOut.description: Asset paid (token ID or "0" for USDC).

owner.description: API key identifier submitting the RFQ order.

neg_risk.description: Whether the market is marked as negative risk.

assets_ids.description: Token identifiers for the market outcomes.

next_cursor.description: Base64 offset for the next page, or LTE= when complete.

question_id.description: Condition identifier for the market (legacy field name).

neg_risk.description: Whether the market is marked as negative risk.

assets_ids.description: Token identifiers for the market outcomes.

next_cursor.description: Base64 offset for the next page, or LTE= when complete.

postOnly.description: When true, the order must rest on the book (GTC/GTD only).

owner.description: API key owner issuing the request.

expiration.description: Optional Unix timestamp expiry expressed as a string.

signer.description: Signing address when different from maker.

taker.description: Counterparty address allowed to fill the order.

signatureType.description: Signature type (0 = EOA, 1 = FactoryProxy, 2 = GnosisSafe, 3 = EIP-1271).

success.description: Indicates whether the order was accepted.

takingAmount.description: Taker amount reported by the placement engine (empty when not provided).

makingAmount.description: Maker amount reported by the placement engine (empty when not provided).

canceled.description: List of order IDs that were successfully canceled.

not_canceled.description: Map of order IDs to cancellation failure reasons.

error.description: Present when `status` is not 200 to explain the failure.

include_24h.description: When true, also computes rolling 24h volume.

tokenIds.description: Exactly two token identifiers whose trades contribute to the totals.

volume.description: Total volume summed across the provided token IDs.

associateTrades.description: Identifiers of trades that include this order.

id.description: Order ULID assigned by the engine.

originalSize.description: Original submitted size, in whole shares.

side.description: Human-readable side of the order book.

sizeMatched.description: Total matched size so far, in whole shares.

expiration.description: Expiration timestamp in seconds (`"0"` when not set).

type.description: Time-in-force policy recorded for the order.

side.description: Side of the taker order (`buy` or `sell`).

size.description: Quantity executed, represented as decimal shares.

maker_address.description: Wallet address that funded the taker order.

matched_amount.description: Quantity from the maker order consumed in this trade.

side.description: When provided, returns only one side of the book.
Optional side filter. When omitted, both BUY and SELL prices are returned.

price.description: Last traded price formatted as a string.

side.description: Side of the most recent aggressor.

SpreadsResponse.description: Bid/ask spread per token expressed as a string.

trade_count.description: Number of trades recorded for the condition.

total_buy_maker_amount.description: Lifetime maker volume on buy side (micro units).

total_buy_taker_amount.description: Lifetime taker volume on buy side (micro units).

total_sell_maker_amount.description: Lifetime maker volume on sell side (micro units).

total_sell_taker_amount.description: Lifetime taker volume on sell side (micro units).

page.description: Zero-based page index echoed from the request.

limit.description: Page size used for the query.

reason.description: Optional human-readable reason for the pause.

key.description: UUID v4 identifier for the API key.

chain_id.description: EVM chain the key operates on.

nonce.description: Deterministic nonce used to derive the key.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the key was created or last reactivated.

revoked_at.description: Timestamp when the key was revoked, if applicable.

last_used_at.description: Last time the key was used successfully.

user_id.description: ULID identifier of the user record.

wallet.description: Wallet address registered to the user.

role.description: Role assigned to the user (`fork`, `client`, or `admin`).

referrer_id.description: ULID of the referring user, when present.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the user record was created.

price.description: Last traded price formatted as a string.

side.description: Side of the most recent aggressor.

scoring.description: Whether the order is currently scoring.

OrdersScoringResponse.description: Map of order IDs to scoring status.
